评论详情: I bought this dress to wear for a wedding. It is a good thing. I know how to sew. It comes with sewn in foam bras that do not fit properly into the darts. I had to cut those out. I ordered a medium and it is considerably big on my shoulders. I have taken darts in the back to take that up. It also is a wrap and I’ve had to sew up the front. It is still too low. I will be buying some lace to put in the V where I have sewn the overlaps together. Would I buy it again? Probably not.
I wore this for my daughter’s wedding. I did get it professionally steamed b/c it was so wrinkled. I also got it stitched so it didn’t gap at the top. Beautiful dress.

can NOT get rid of wrinkles :( following 'hand wash' label, but line dry is not an option also tried Downey anti-wrinkle spray & air fluff on dryer - STILL wrinkled :( says NOT to dry clean no info on ironing (and I don't have an iron) :/
It's beautiful, it fits, the color is great, but the wrinkles will not steam out, and it is incredibly frustrating.

评论概述: Wonderful dress, the size chart is easy, it fits perfectly.
评论详情: Wonderful dress, the size chart is easy, it fits perfectly.

评论概述: True to size. Very low cut V neck
评论详情: Nice dress. But after one more look I discovered it has been worn. It has underarm sweat stains. I did arrive very wrinkled and the hanging tag cord was cut.

评论概述: Fits as stated in sizing guide
评论详情: I'm 5'4", about 140 lbs, and DD bust...my body is bigger on top than the bottom. The size 12 just fit my bust perfectly and the waist is comfortable. Love the color, style is flattering, and well made. The zipper catches ever so slightly on the material, but zip it slow and it's fine. It's a little wrinkled, but that is to be expected since it comes packed in a bag. I recommend it and would buy it again.
Nice dress. Flattering style Fabric feels nice
Talla perfecta , color hermoso. Me encanto
Not well fitting. More expensive than should be. Had to send back
It looked like a Halloween dress. Does not come how it is pictured.

I love everything about this dress! The style, the color and the fit! I got lots of compliments on it. It is extremely true to size though, no give in the material so choose realistically. Hand wash only, no dry cleaning.
I’m 5ft flat and so the waist of this dress did not sit where I would have liked. It was also very wrinkled and I tried to steam it with no luck. Pretty but not stunning. Overall not impressed.
Beautiful deress, true to size ans color, good quality. Perfect for the ocassion. Just a little difficul to get rid of wrinkles.
Matron of honor.
The cut is so flattering! Love the color!

I am 5'7", weigh about 165 and have 36DDD chest. Buying a dress online is always a gamble so I bought a size 10 and 12 just in case. The size 12 was the winner for me. As you can see from the picture, it's not super tight but that's what I wanted. If you have a similar physique but smaller breasts, you could go with a size 10.  Otherwise, I am pleasantly surprised with the fit and quality of this dress (especially for the price). It's lined and not super thin material. It was also longer on me than I was expecting given the pictures (the model in the photos must be much taller than me). I was very happy with the length.

This dress feels like a high quality clothing purchase for being from Amazon at a reasonable price point. It is great for a fall wedding. The color is exactly as expected and the fit is perfect. Be aware that this chiffon type material has no stretch so check your measurements. I would definitely buy this again!

Beautiful style and color. I ordered my regular size for a beach wedding. It is cut low but easily pinned.  I wanted to add that it washes well. I dropped something greasy in my lap. It was several days before I was able to do laundry. I put Dawn dishwashing liquid on the spot, washed it inside out with other soft items and dried for a few minutes. The greasy spot wasn't totally gone so I applied more Dawn, washed again and accidentally dried it completely with no problems. The spot was gone, no damage and no wrinkles.
Love this dress!!! So comfortable!
I wore this dress for a summer wedding.  It was very comfortable and allowed me to dance the night away.

I bought this dress to wear to a wedding. It looked great, I love it, I got a lot of compliments on the dress. I will say if you have larger breast size ( double D) it is a little snug in that area. It still looked amazing though.
The dress was really beautiful and I was very pleased

评论概述: Loved the look and feel of this dress!
评论详情: I bought this dress for a wedding and it was perfect.  The first time I placed an order I received the wrong dress.  Returned it and reordered and got the correct dress.  The dress was true to size, and was very comfortable throughout the night.  I felt good in the dress.  It took just a light ironing before wearing.  I washed in cold on delicate and hung to dry and it turned out great.  Highly recommend!
Beautiful, have not tried it on yet?

评论概述: Pretty but style not for me
评论详情: I am 5’11.5” 180lb and 37/35/42.  Usually wear 12 or 14.  I got a 14 based on reviews.  I think it was too big all over.  I could have sized down to a 12 for the waist and bottom, but it would have still been too big on top(I am a small A cup).For someone my height, I will say the sleeve length and dress length was good.  It was right at my knees in the front.

评论概述: Well designed dress and fits very well
评论详情: The dress fit very well, It did come down a little low in the front for me. I just placed a pin on it to hold it together  a little more until I have time to fix it right. I got the dark purple and it is a beautiful color. After ordering the dress. It came in a very timely manner.

Purchased for a wedding coming up and so excited that it came in time. Took it out of the packaging to try it on and was instantly upset. This dress was stained on the front!!! So upset! Mother of the bride and no dress! The town I live in is very limited on shops. I took time off work to drive to a bridal shop and thankfully they had a beautiful gown/dress. It was perfect and guess what? No stains. I will never shop with Everpretty again. Only 1 star due to stained product arriving on time, otherwise I give a minus 10!
Love this dress.

This is a very cheaply made dress. I have had it for two weeks now and have had no luck getting the wrinkles out. It isn't comfortable to wear as it looks like it would be. I would not buy this item again. I don't have time to return it or else I would.
Too small I will return it
I purchased this dress for my mom. She loves the dress!!

I'm 5' 2" 125 pounds and 48 years old. I chose the size small. I wanted a flattering dress to wear as Mother of the Groom. I loved the rich plum color and the flow of this dress. I chose tea length because even with heels most floor length gowns are too long. The shoulders did need to be taken in a bit and the stitching that kept the bust together could have been a bit stronger but overall this dress had nice structure and felt great. The price was excellent. Similar dresses from bridal companies were $200+ Even at $70, I am hoping I find another opportunity to wear it. If you know your dress size, order with confidence.

评论概述: Color not true to what was portrayed. Pretty dress but the color was more of a red burgundy.
评论详情: It was a pretty dress but not true to the color. It looked to be a burgundy but was more red when it arrived. Not a suitable color for an upcoming wedding so I returned it for teal which I am very happy with. Nice flattering fit for the price.

After trying dozens of dresses, this was the most flattering. I don’t love the longer back than front hem but the rest of the dress worked so well I decided to keep it. Very well made. I’m wearing it to my son’s wedding.
The color was perfect for fall wedding. The fit was very comfortable. Loved the lightness of fabric since it is still a little humid here. Sizing was appropriately described. Neckline was just right.
Too long for height
Love the feel and flow to this dress. The chest was a tad too big, so I had someone tack it up and it fits beautifully.  The pleats look perfect still. I bought this for my Mother of the Bride dress.
It really has no waist at all. Not a very flattering dress
Look like what I saw.
Such a beautiful dress! Especially for the price! I ordered a size 16 and it is true to size

I needed a navy dress for a wedding.  I loved the dress and was well made, but unfortunately it was too large, so sadly I had to return it.  I think you will be happy if you choose this dress.  It seemed it would be very comfortable, and you wouldn’t have to wear shapewear under it unless you want.

It was a beautiful dress, I love the feel of the fabric but unfortunately it was too tight in the bust area for me. My girls are bigger, so if you have big boobs, this dress will be tight in that area and it won’t look right.
This is a lovely dress and fits well; unfortunately, I have to return it as it won't work for the intended event (mother of the bride).
The fit and flow of the dress is perfect. Was afraid the green would be too bright for my occasion but it’s actually almost hunter green. Beautiful! I may order it in other colors as well.
The dress is pretty and it fits well, but it came damaged.
Beautiful dress! It was just too short waisted for me.  It doesn’t hang right on big bust lines
Arrived shrink wrapped, full of wrinkles, was not a material I could iron. I was afraid the wrinkles would never come out, i returned it

I ordered this dress for a wedding.  I love it.  Fits really well and looks beautiful.  It is not constricting and is very comfortable as well.  Only negative, there was a small tear in the fabric.  I ordered it too close to the event to send back and order a new one so I wore it anyway.  No one seemed to notice thankfully, but I would have really loved to be able to keep this as a "go-to" for any dress up events and that's not gonna happen with the tear.
The most difficult return process for this terrible quality dress. Pretty sure it’s SHEIN with a different label.

Quality garment. Looks better in person than in photo. True to size.  Glamor with modesty.  It is a keeper that can be dressy enough for a wedding or cocktail party or simple enough for a fancy dinner date.

I like the dress the color was very nice. But I’m very short and the waste line didn’t hit me in a good place. Because I’ll be wearing it at church with my bust size., it-looked too provocative so I’m going to have to return it.  If you want something, subtly sexy this dress is for you
Runs very small. Thin material. Itchy fabric, not worth the price. I’m a size 14, perhaps the smaller girls would have better luck. It’s a no go for this girl. Pretty color though!!
Happy with the quality for the price. It’s easy to slip into and was true to size.
Bought it for mom to wear to a wedding she loved it
Very uncomfortable material.  Fit ok although the chest is padded and I don’t need or like that
Bought for an up n coming wedding. I love the sheer long sleeves because I’m always cold. The wedding is in September so I’m not sure how the weather will be by then. Hope it all works out!!

Ok just not my style
A good mysterious movie. A romance gone wrong and a who did it plot. I gave it a 4 because I found acting a little bad.
It fit perfect. Use the size chart and measurements. The color is beautiful and the fabric felt great on the skin.  I wore it to my daughters wedding and it moved nicely while dancing.
This dress came in with cuts in the fabric so I had to send it back, but the fit wasn't great, very see through, and not great for most body types.

This was my dress for my civil wedding ceremony. Included a bra pad inside so I did not have to wear my bratop. Considering it's under $100, it is well made and people complimented on my dress :) Recommend very much.

I bought this dress to wear to my granddaughters wedding. The quality was horrible. There was no hem on the chiffon part, fabric was cheap and thin, you could see my white underwear thru the lining, the neckline was sloppy and gaping. My granddaughter begged me not to wear it, so I returned it and bought two other dresses to choose from. Both of them wear good so I kept both. This dress? Don’t bother.
Fabric and quality was nice.  It was a little low in the chest area.
Very nice dress.
Very comfortable
This dress is gorgeous!  I found it ran a little small.  I ordered a 10 which is my usual size but need a 12.  I ordered it in navy blue.  Very flattering.

评论概述: Material was very thick and heavy
评论详情: As above. The color, however, was beautiful.
Very pretty but runs a little large. I will have to have it tailored.
Wrong color for me and didn't fit
Disliked because it seems to be poorly made, the material is nice. Too low cut for me. Did not keep. True to size.
Bought for my sister. It was perfect style. Carefree nice fit and length. The high low especially help with the flow.

I tried this one on an another in another size for my daughter's wedding. Although it was pretty and very well made, just didn't seem dressy enough for a mother of the bride dress. Great for cocktail parties or the like. Color was nice and was true to size. Very flattering.

This dress was perfect for a more formal occasion.  Easy to wash (I used a garment bag, hand wash setting, and delicate clothing detergent) and then hang dry. For wrinkles, steaming worked amazingly well and kept it wrinkle-free for most of the afternoon/evening.  I did reinforce the single stitch in the chest area to ensure it didn’t break or tear the fabric and helped offer a bit more support (took less than a minute to reinforce).  I’d normally wear a size 12, but ordered a size 14 based on other reviews. This was perfect for the chest area and thankfully the waist area didn’t look too baggy or loose (it was very comfortable and no worries about feeling constricted after eating).  The material was very soft and lightweight. No issues with itchiness or feeling uncomfortable at all (I have very sensitive skin and touch sense, so this was a huge plus for me). The color was gorgeous and exactly as advertised online.
Dress is gorgeous, it just didn’t go well with my body shape
I wore this dress to a June wedding. It's both dressy and comfortable. Lot of compliments.

I ordered the dusty blue color. It’s a beautiful dress, but if you sweat the least little bit it’s going to show. Wore it to a June wedding and was embarrassed to find that it shows sweat stains very easily. Would recommend ordering in a darker color.

The style of the dress is fine but it has a strong smell like a wet dog and weed. It’s so strong I hung it outside for a week and can still smell it. I am afraid to wash it because of shrinkage. I may have to send it back

评论概述: This is a very pretty dress.
评论详情: The dress is well made, and it hangs so beautifully. The size is perfect and the fabric is great,
Great dress!
Fit perfectly but was really hard to zip because zipper would get stuck halfway.

Bought this for my mother to wear to a wedding and she looked absolutely beautiful in it! It fit great and the fabric was comfortable and opaque and flowed nicely when she walked around.  She can absolutely wear it again due to its versatility.  The value for money is right where I wanted to spend! The washability was normal and hung dry and there were no changes in the elasticity of the dress after washing.
Romantic dress love it built in bra I am 5'5" 200lbs apple body XXL was perfect. Made well love the high low, looks very classic.
Material Is comfortable Length is perfect Sleeves are comfortable

I ordered this for my son's garden wedding. The color was an emerald green, just what I wanted.  I am 5'4, 149#, I ordered a size 10 and it fit perfect. I received numerous compliments on the dress and how great I looked. I am an older person so was afraid it was too young for me but with the sheer 3/4 sleeves, it was perfect. I would recommend this dress!

Wore this dress to a wedding. It was very comfortable, lightweight, easy to wear and was cool for an outdoor event. The colour was beautiful and tied in well with the theme. Only wish I had bought one size smaller as it was tad big in the chest area, but not so much that it was noticeable.
Ordered for wedding, perfect! Well pleased!

High quality and fits to size. I was extremely pleased!
I love my dress!  It's very flattering. I will order additional colors.
The size was accurate, it's lined with built in lightly padded bra. I wore it to a wedding and had a lot of compliments. I'm 5'5, 145 pounds and wear a size 6.

My measurements: bust 48 (30J bra), waist 28, hips 45. I ordered a size 12 because of my bust.. I'm a woman Large shirt, 10/12 pants.. The dress is beautiful, nice material, does not feel cheap, below the bust there's very little stretch, I ordered the size 12, my waist is 28 inches around, I had about 3 inches of extra material around my waist, I filled out those extra inches when I sat down. I went up to size 12 because of my bust, in which the dress was tight around my bust, theres no stretch, there are little pads inside of the bust area. The bottom of the dress is very flowy, theres a zipper up the back middle of the dress too... I'm glad I picked this dress. I recommend it, but check your own body measurements and remember there's very little stretch below the bust.
